name: Tonk! Multiplayer Card Game
description:
Tonk (also known as Tunk), is a fast paced card game similar to Rummy. It's a popular pastime for lunch breaks and family game nights.

Play this timeless classic anywhere! With your friends or against strangers with realtime multiplayer supporting 1-3 players! Or play solo in a single player game against our smart AI and earn even more bucks!

Additional game modes, backgrounds, and card decks coming soon!

=FEATURES=
- Realtime multiplayer gameplay, no waiting or timers!
- This is Tonk perfected for mobile & the only Multiplayer Tonk available!
- Earn Big Bucks: Level up as you build your bank roll and become a pro Tonk player!
- Play with Friends and Family: Supports 2 - 3 players, and invite your Facebook friends!
- Smart single play AI make every game fun!
- Tons of Achievements and detailed stat tracking!
- Play your way to top the Leaderboards!
- Huge Table Limits: Earn your way to the High Rollers Table!
- and much more!

So are you game? Try now for FREE

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support from the feedback tab within the app.
